page.title: 20TRANSPORT
page.content: {TRAIN.}The nearest train station is at Loughbourgh (13km or 8 mile).This gives connections to London,Sheffield, Leicester,and Nottingham.The trains are high speed diesel powered express. {AIRPORT.}The nearest airport is East Midlands Airport (10km or 6miles) Daily services go to Paris, Brussels, London, Belfast and Amsterdam. Many charter flights and freight companies use E. Midlands Airport. {BUS.}The only public transport though Newbold is the local bus service to Loughborough and to Coalville.There are l3 buses on week days and 9 buses on a Saturday. {ROAD.}The B 587 road runs though the village. Newbold is connected with Worthington by a road.The nearest motorway is the M1 which is approx 8 miles or 13km away.
